original_text: We all make many mistakes. So, if someone never says anything that is bad, that person is completely good. It shows that he has authority over his whole body.
korean_text: 우리가 다 실수가 많으니 만일 말에 실수가 없는 자라면 곧 온전한 사람이라 능히 온 몸도 굴레 씌우리라

sentences.original_text: So, if someone never says anything that is bad,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로, 만약 누군가 나쁜 말을 전혀 하지 않으면,

sentences.original_text: It shows that he has authority
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 권위를 가지고 있다는 것을 보여줍니다.
